MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL49 postcode area of Porthmadog, affecting properties in Snowdon Street, Sawmill Terrace and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 10:07 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further investigations are required. As soon as we have a confirmed time for restoration of supply we will update this message again. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:36 pm on 22nd January, 2021.
